name: Little Avenger
description:
Slay monsters for epic LOOT!

Complete dungeons to reach the last stages of the game and the final boss. Will you be victorious as you climb the leaderboards?

FEATURES:

-Tons of loot drops from monsters and bosses.
-Dozens of different monster types + difficulties.
-100s of items to CUSTOMIZE the look of your avenger.
-Statistic points rewarded each level-up to IMPROVE your avenger's attributes.
-Leaderboard system.
